comment: Dr. T was by FAR one of the best professors I have had at KSU. She really cares about her students. She makes this class fun with her assignments which in my opinion is better because it keeps you interested in the class. Definitely one of the easiest classes.

She was amazing! One quiz and easy assignment per week. Zero tests until final. She doesn't believe in lockdown browser. She is very easy to reach through groupme or email. She is the sweetest! Very easy class to get an A in. Very thankful for her!

Dr. Tis is an easy A if you put all the work in! 15 easy quizzes straight from the book, assignments that were either word searches or crosswords, and 25 bonus points for doing an intro discussion post about yourself. She caring, genuinely wants her students to do well, and has a groupme with her in it to ask questions! very useful class!

Dr. T was an amazing and easy teacher. There was a quiz every week on medical words straight from the textbook. Very easy quizzes as long as you read the book. 1 - 2 easy assignments every week. Assignments included crossword puzzles, word searches, and definitions. Take Dr. T for ES 2300! Ended with an A.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Took Med Term online. She is very clear, fair, and straightforward on what she wants. She is very credible and professional. She is quick to respond with emails and she is nice. Her class is not hard. You have assignments and quizzes weekly. Easy A.
Took it online. Do all of the modules by their (close to) deadline, and it's the easiest A of your life. She cares about your health and accomplishing your goals and makes it very easy to do well.
Great feedback! Read and keep up, you will pass the class very easily.

It's an online class regardless and mandatory for ES majors. The amount of work you have to do is ridiculously tedious (word searches and word scrambles due every single week) but if you just get it done you'll make 100s. She's there if you have questions and is an easy grader. I'd recommend her for this class. I didn't use my book once.
Very nice and gives good feedback. Easy online class. She gives you ample time to complete modules. No tests or quizzes. Easy A and great professor.
Easiest class you could ever take online. No test and no quizzes. Very simple assignments and discussions. And due dates are every 2 weeks instead of every week. And she's very nice!

This is a mandatory class. Dr T made it easy. Just follow her directions and always do the online assignments on time and it's an EASY A. I don't know why anyone would take this class any other way than online. Don't miss turning in assignments

Lots of labs, quizzes everyy week, lots of reading in book so that you can answer quiz questions.  Hard tests, but a B is doable.  This is not an easy A so don't be fooled when you sign up for the online class.

Really easy online class. Total of 6 modules. Due dates are every 2 weeks. No tests no quizzes. This class was way to easy and she's really great at replying and very helpful. If you have a medical problem she's will to help you. Don't know what grade i got yet but I'm pretty sure it's an A! And
EXTREMELY rude in email responses to students.

Class is required. Have NO idea why anyone would take this class any way but online. Dr T posted every explanation, and clarified everything. Take her class, and look at the grading scale. No way do you have to do all the boring HLP updates, you can get an easy A-B doing half the work.

I didn't buy the textbook but it was needed. There is a lot of work to do (assignments, quizzes, discussions) quizzes are unlimited time & can take until you get a good grade. Discussion's easy. She is very clear about what she wants; also very helpful and nice.  Don't slack or wait til last minute to turn in work! Put in effort!!
EASY A! Helpful. Knowledgable. Work is tedious, but easy.
Easy grader. Quick to reply to emails. Super helpful. Assignments were EASY, but informative. I had her for 2 classes this semester. Made an A in both classes.

Do not take her!! So many assignments which were somewheat easy yet very confusing! Some assignments uploaded did not allow you to save and edit therefore making it difficult to complete & turn in! Not all assignments showed on the "what's next?" side for the week. You MUST read your syllabus every week for assignments. TERRIBLE CLASS!

Professor Tis was my online health teacher. Her rubric was simple, 2 quizzes, 2 assignments, and a discussion every month. Some of the assignments were kind of tough, but overall, easy A. You can retake the quizzes as many times as you want, but every take is averaged together. They are also open until the last day of class.
